title: Ethereal Ambiance Music Pack
description: 10 seamlessly loopable, light ambient tracks ideal for relaxing puzzle/casual games or simulators
longDescription:
This pack contains 10 seamlessly loopable, light ambient tracks (16-bit, 44.1kHz wav files) and 26 minutes, 37 seconds of original music.


A collection of light ambient tracks and celestial soundscapes made entirely with soft, delicate pads. Perfect for save rooms, loading screens, menu themes and credit scenes, and any game areas that are spacey, sacred, mystical, magical, peaceful, or otherworldly.


You can listen to the music pack in full before purchase here: https://soundcloud.com/aleksis_tristan_shaw/sets/ethereal-ambiance


TRACKLIST:


The Welkin Ring (LOOP) [5:53]

Celestial Oblivion (LOOP) [1:06]
